databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID, THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_NAME, MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, SHOW_ORDER, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS FROM MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI ORDER BY MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, SHOW_ORDER

SELECT MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID, THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_NAME, MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, SHOW_ORDER, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS FROM MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI
WHERE MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID

INSERT INTO MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI( MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID, THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_NAME, MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, SHOW_ORDER, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID, :THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_NAME, :MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, :SHOW_ORDER, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI SET THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_NAME = :THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_NAME, MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID AND TS = :TS
